Key Match Events: Kylian Mbapp√© scored a penalty in the 56th minute to break the deadlock.
Robert Lewandowski equalized with a spot kick in the 79th minute after his initial effort was saved.
Pre-Game Insights: France needed to win to secure top place in Group D.Poland's goalkeeper Lukasz Skorupski made several key saves.The match was France's first European Championship game where they failed to finish top of their group in 12 years.
Post-Match Reflections: Didier Deschamps expressed frustration with the result but acknowledged the team's efforts.
The match left France to face the runner-up of Group E in the knockout stage.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was played at Signal Iduna Park in Dortmund, Germany.
Others: France's performance was criticized for lacking creativity and vertical play.
Poland's fans created a raucous atmosphere in the second half.
